answers.answer: Yes I am, although my baby is measuring small, I'm getting induced at 38+6 . And I'm currently 37+5 .

question: Is or has anybody else getting induced or have been induced due to gestational diabetes? I'm getting induced at 39 weeks because they don't want the baby to grow too much, I'm not worried or anything I just wanna know if anybody else has experienced this or is experiencing it. Btw I'm 34 weeks now.
title: Inducing because of gestational diabetes
